about_the_game:
Yes, you can do puzzles! - AmberFrmThVault Gaming

TL;DR: A jigsaw puzzle game with hand drawn cat pictures 🎨🖌️🖼️🐈🧩📦💝
(Sorry (not sorry) for the clickbait)

Gameplay


Is there anything better than a good, relaxing puzzle game?
Of course: A good, relaxing puzzle game with pussies in it!
And what would make it EVEN better? If those high detailed pussy master”pieces” were hand drawn by JujiBla!
Pick a pussy puzzle you like and solve it in one of the 3 different puzzle sizes. Once all 3 of them have been solved you will unlock the “bigger than FULL-HD” wallpaper.

Features




  • 27+ “pussys with character” to puzzle
  • 3 different puzzle sizes
  • +3 different puzzle sizes with the free DLC
  • 28 beautiful wallpapers to unlock
  • Larger than Full-HD WQXGA wallpapers (2560x1600) for desktop and mobile
  • Puzzle piece rotation (optional)
  • Chill music
  • Hint system
  • Different backgrounds to your liking
  • Steam achievements

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i3 / AMD A6-9500
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 / AMD Radeon R5
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Recommended
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 / Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1050 / AMD Radeon VEGA or similar
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Recommended

  • OS: macOS Catalina 10.15
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 / AMD Radeon R5
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Recommended
